title: Emmerdale's Natalie J Robb reveals 'creepy' men want her to be like Mucky Moira in real life
text:
Her character Moira Dingle is no stranger to a steamy fling, with the farmer currently embarking on a sizzling affair with farmhand Nate Robinson.

However, actress Natalie J Robb has revealed dating can be 'difficult' as some men expect her to be like her bed-hopping alter ego, nicknamed Mucky Moira, in real life.

The 44-year-old star, who is single, admitted that she gets a lot of attention from the opposite sex, but has had some 'creepy moments' from men who confuse her and her character.

Tough times: Emmerdale's Natalie J Robb revealed dating can be 'difficult' as 'creepy' men want her to be like her bed-hopping alter ego Mucky Moira in real life

Speaking about her dating dilemma, she told Mirror Online: 'In this industry it is very difficult to know if people want you to be you.

'I play characters but it is not real - I have come across it and it is a bit frightening. I have had some creepy moments and it did put me off.'

The Scottish beauty went on to say that she doesn't have 'time' for a relationship and is quite 'happy' being single.

She continued: 'I don’t have time for romance. I am still single. But I am quite a happy single person. You accept yourself.'

Steamy: The 44-year-old star, who is single, admitted that she gets a lot of attention, but has had some 'creepy moments' from men who confuse her and her character

Unwanted attention: 'I play characters but it is not real - I have come across it and it is a bit frightening. I have had some creepy moments and it did put me off'

Discussing online dating, Natalie ruled out doing the 'online thing' as she thinks it's 'quite dodgy', though several of her friends have given it a go.

Meanwhile, over in Emmerdale this week, Moira's steamy affair with employee Nate (Jurrel Carter) is set to be exposed by her furious husband Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley).

In explosive scenes, Cain tricks the cheating duo into accompanying him on a fishing trip, but things soon get tense when he reveals what he knows.

The secret's out: Meanwhile, over in Emmerdale this week, Moira's steamy affair with employee Nate (Jurrel Carter) is set to be exposed by her furious husband Cain Dingle (Jeff Hordley)

Confrontation: In explosive scenes, Cain tricks the cheating duo into accompanying him on a fishing trip, but things soon get tense when he reveals what he knows

A fight soon breaks out, with a murderous Cain attacking Nate with a piece of wood in a bid to finish him off.

But disaster strikes as Moira accidentally gets knocked overboard and plunges into the freezing water below, where she soon becomes trapped in some weeds.

Meanwhile, a leaking gas canister causes a huge explosion that rips through the boat - will any of the warring trio survive?

Emmerdale continues weekdays at 7pm on ITV.

Attack: But disaster strikes as Moira accidentally gets knocked overboard and plunges into the freezing water below, where she soon becomes trapped in some weeds
description: Emmerdale's Natalie J Robb, 44, revealed dating can be 'difficult' as 'creepy' men want her to be like her bed-hopping alter ego Mucky Moira in real life.
